title: [Wexna's Outfitting]
[Wexna's General Store]
description: Blue watered silk walls rise from a glossy mahogany floor.  Just above a large potted fern hangs an intricate knot-worked wall-hanging, and a vaulted ceiling completes the picture.  An elegantly carved oak armoire and a polished maoral table stand side by side in the middle of the room.
